snippet.title: "Super Columbine Massacre RPG!" (trailer)
snippet.description:
The documentary film "Playing Columbine" is online now, telling the whole story of what happened after this game was released.  http://playingcolumbine.com/

This game delves into the morning of April 20th, 1999 and asks players to relive that day through the eyes of Eric Harris and Dylan Klebold, those responsible for one of the deadliest school shootings in American history. Learn more at: http://columbinegame.com/

iTunes: http://itunes.apple.com/us/movie/playing-columbine/id437215229
Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004Z0Q71W
Netflix streaming: http://movies.netflix.com/WiMovie/Playing_Columbine/70153294
